about_the_game:
ABOUT THE EXPERIENCE:


Insomnia: "prolonged and usually abnormal inability to get enough sleep especially due to trouble falling asleep or staying asleep" - Some Dictionary

The game is simple... Try to sleep. We can't promise that the night will be uneventful, however. Between apparitions of ancient interdimensional entities to a city that never sleeps, overcoming your insomnia may prove to be difficult.

EARLY ACCESS FEATURES:


  • A cozy bed to sleep in,
  • An elegant but unreliable pocket watch subject to the wills of the supernatural,
  • Retro alarm clock to keep track of the countless hours you haven't slept,
  • Immersive sound design made by a schizophrenic insomniac,
  • Your own personal sleep paralysis demon!

RELEASE ROADMAP:


  • More dreamscapes to explore and interact with,
  • Additional spontaneous events to experience in the waking world,
  • New decisions to make and additional endings to discover,
  • Comprehensive conclusion to the story and the hints that correlate,

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-10900K 3.70GHz or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

short_description: Experience one night as a man diagnosed with a strange and incurable form of insomnia. Your only goal is to sleep until dawn, but after the lines between your nightmares and your waking life are blurred… you might not want to sleep afterall.
